# CoppeRSA Lattice (70 Points)
There are plenty of bits of randomness in the key. This has to be secure!
<br>
I am so confident, that I am sharing a snippet of my implementation:
```python
import random
base = random.getrandbits(2048)
p = next_prime(base + random.getrandbits(256))
q = next_prime(base + random.getrandbits(256))
n = p * q
e = 65537
print("e = ", e)
print("n = ", n)
c = power_mod(m, e, n)
print("c = ", c)
```
Output :
```
e = 65537
n = 
c = 
```
# Solved
Challenge yang sama dengan <b>RSA</b> sebelumnya hanya sekedar mencari <b>P</b> dan <b>Q</b>
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import inverse

e = 65537
n = 
c = 


p = 
q = 

phi = ( p - 1 ) * ( q - 1 )

d = inverse(e, phi)
m = pow(c, d, n)

print(hex(m))
```
```
4354466c6561726e7b6e30745f746834745f7333637572335f34667433725f346c6c7d

CTFlearn{n0t_th4t_s3cur3_4ft3r_4ll}
```
Flag : <b>CTFlearn{n0t_th4t_s3cur3_4ft3r_4ll}</b>
